Author: Allison
Title: GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are now generally available in GitHub Copilot
EnhancedContent:
GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile, Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse through the chat model picker (agent, ask, and edit modes). If you do not yet have access, please check again later.

### Enabling access

Copilot Business and Copilot Enterprise administrators must opt in by enabling the new GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex policies in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the models in the model picker across all supported IDEs.

For individual plans, enable either model by selecting it in the model picker in any supported IDE and confirming the one-time prompt.

### Share your feedback

To learn more about the models available in Copilot, see [our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/supported-models) and get started with Copilot today.

Join the [GitHub Community](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/categories/copilot-conversations) to share your feedback.
